question: [Rapid] Espanol: Identifica the slope of the noisy line para la recta dibujada.

qas.question: [Rapid] Espanol: Identifica the slope of the noisy line para la recta dibujada.
[Challenge] English: Identify the intercept of the noisy line for the plotted line.
